inclusion.criterion: Eighteen years of age or older at screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Naive to treatment for hepatitis C or treatment experienced on previous IFN-containing treatment for chronic HCV infection.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women are allowed to participate if they agree to always use at least two forms of birth control.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant illness (other than HCV) or any other major medical disorder that may interfere with the subject treatment, assessment of compliance with the protocol;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Gastrointestinal disorder with post-operative condition that could interfere with the absorption of the study drug
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on IFN plus RBV combination therapy. He does not have any clinically significant illness or major medical disorder that may interfere with treatment.
